function makeGuess(uint256 _collectionId, uint256 _characterId) external returns (bool isCorrect, uint256 attempts)
function verifyGuess(uint256 _collectionId, uint256 _characterId) external view returns (bool)
function getAttempts(address _player, uint256 _collectionId, uint256 _day) external view returns (uint256)
function getPlayerGuesses(address _player, uint256 _collectionId) external view returns ((address player, uint256 collectionId, uint256 characterId, uint256 timestamp, bool isCorrect)[])
function getCollection(uint256 _collectionId) external view returns ((uint256 id, string name, bytes32 dailyCharacterHash, uint256 lastUpdateDay))
function getCharacter(uint256 _collectionId, uint256 _characterId) external view returns ((uint256 id, uint256 collectionId, string name, bytes32 attributesHash))
function addCharacter(uint256 _collectionId, string memory _name, bytes32 _attributesHash) external returns (uint256)
event GuessMade(address indexed player, uint256 indexed collectionId, uint256 indexed characterId, bool isCorrect, uint256 attempts)
event CollectionCreated(uint256 indexed collectionId, string name)
event CharacterAdded(uint256 indexed collectionId, uint256 indexed characterId, string name)
event DailyCharacterUpdated(uint256 indexed collectionId, bytes32 characterHash, uint256 day)
